name: despicable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
very unpleasant or bad, causing strong feelings of dislike: despicable behaviour He's a despicable human being! It was despicable of her to lie about her friend. Synonyms
abominable
contemptible
execrable formal
odious formal
vile

deserving to be hated or strongly criticized: It was a despicable effort to blackmail voters.
